data.title: Boston Children's Health Physicians
data.text:
The Boston Children’s Health Physicians (BCHP) Division of Pediatric Gastroenterology, located in New York and Connecticut, provides comprehensive, specialized care for children with digestive disorders. We are a team of pediatric gastroenterologists committed to your child’s health and well-being.

Gastrointestinal (GI) issues can have a profound effect on a child's quality of life and overall development. That's why we offer a wide range of diagnostic and treatment options tailored to meet each child’s needs. From common conditions such as acid reflux and constipation to more complex disorders like inflammatory bowel disease and eosinophilic esophagitis, our experts are well versed in providing kind, compassionate care for a diverse array of GI conditions.
